content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'EFF_CSV_Header') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [EFF_CSV_Header] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE,
			 FIRST_ROW = 2,
			 ENCODING = 'UTF8'
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'EDS_SynapseDvDemo_Hadoop') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [EDS_SynapseDvDemo_Hadoop] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://synapsedvdemo@synapsedvdemo.dfs.core.windows.net',
		TYPE = HADOOP
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE stage1.superheroes_nlp_dataset (
	[name] varchar(4000),
	[real_name] varchar(4000),
	[full_name] varchar(4000),
	[overall_score] varchar(4000),
	[history_text] varchar(4000),
	[powers_text] varchar(4000),
	[intelligence_score] varchar(60),
	[strength_score] varchar(60),
	[speed_score] varchar(60),
	[durability_score] varchar(60),
	[power_score] varchar(60),
	[combat_score] varchar(60),
	[superpowers] varchar(4000),
	[alter_egos] varchar(4000),
	[aliases] varchar(4000),
	[place_of_birth] varchar(4000),
	[first_appearance] varchar(4000),
	[creator] varchar(4000),
	[alignment] varchar(4000),
	[occupation] varchar(4000),
	[base] varchar(4000),
	[teams] varchar(4000),
	[relatives] varchar(4000),
	[gender] varchar(4000),
	[type_race] varchar(4000),
	[height] varchar(4000),
	[weight] varchar(4000),
	[eye_color] varchar(4000),
	[hair_color] varchar(4000),
	[skin_color] varchar(4000),
	[img] varchar(4000),
	[has_electrokinesis] varchar(60),
	[has_energy_constructs] varchar(60),
	[has_mind_control_resistance] varchar(60),
	[has_matter_manipulation] varchar(60),
	[has_telepathy_resistance] varchar(60),
	[has_mind_control] varchar(60),
	[has_enhanced_hearing] varchar(60),
	[has_dimensional_travel] varchar(60),
	[has_element_control] varchar(60),
	[has_size_changing] varchar(60),
	[has_fire_resistance] varchar(60),
	[has_fire_control] varchar(60),
	[has_dexterity] varchar(60),
	[has_reality_warping] varchar(60),
	[has_illusions] varchar(60),
	[has_energy_beams] varchar(60),
	[has_peak_human_condition] varchar(60),
	[has_shapeshifting] varchar(60),
	[has_heat_resistance] varchar(60),
	[has_jump] varchar(60),
	[has_self-sustenance] varchar(60),
	[has_energy_absorption] varchar(60),
	[has_cold_resistance] varchar(60),
	[has_magic] varchar(60),
	[has_telekinesis] varchar(60),
	[has_toxin_and_disease_resistance] varchar(60),
	[has_telepathy] varchar(60),
	[has_regeneration] varchar(60),
	[has_immortality] varchar(60),
	[has_teleportation] varchar(60),
	[has_force_fields] varchar(60),
	[has_energy_manipulation] varchar(60),
	[has_endurance] varchar(60),
	[has_longevity] varchar(60),
	[has_weapon-based_powers] varchar(60),
	[has_energy_blasts] varchar(60),
	[has_enhanced_senses] varchar(60),
	[has_invulnerability] varchar(60),
	[has_stealth] varchar(60),
	[has_marksmanship] varchar(60),
	[has_flight] varchar(60),
	[has_accelerated_healing] varchar(60),
	[has_weapons_master] varchar(60),
	[has_intelligence] varchar(60),
	[has_reflexes] varchar(60),
	[has_super_speed] varchar(60),
	[has_durability] varchar(60),
	[has_stamina] varchar(60),
	[has_agility] varchar(60),
	[has_super_strength] varchar(60)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Data/kaggle_superhero/superheroes_nlp_dataset.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [EDS_SynapseDvDemo],
	FILE_FORMAT = [EFF_CSV_Header]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM stage1.superheroes_nlp_dataset
GO
